metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The friendly name for the workspace that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The friendly name for the connected cluster.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The Azure region with which the workbook will be associated

content.query:
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| distinct cluster_s, devices_name_s, devices_ipaddress_s, devices_sku_s, devices_vendor_s
content.title: Device Name

content.query:
let row = dynamic({Row});
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| where '{Row}' == '{}' or (devices_name_s == row.devices_name_s)
| project devices_name_s, cluster_result_s, devices_boot_info_boot_info_result_s, devices_device_result_s, devices_device_login_s, devices_system_info_system_info_result_s, devices_health_info_health_info_result_s, devices_network_info_network_info_result_s, devices_drive_info_drive_info_result_s
| summarize arg_max(cluster_result_s, devices_boot_info_boot_info_result_s, devices_device_result_s, devices_device_login_s, devices_system_info_system_info_result_s, devices_health_info_health_info_result_s, devices_network_info_network_info_result_s, devices_drive_info_drive_info_result_s) by tostring(devices_name_s)
| extend ClusterResult = cluster_result_s, DeviceBootResult = devices_boot_info_boot_info_result_s, DeviceResult = devices_device_result_s, DeviceLogin = devices_device_login_s, SystemResult = devices_system_info_system_info_result_s, HealthResult = devices_health_info_health_info_result_s, NetworkResult = devices_network_info_network_info_result_s, DriveResult = devices_drive_info_drive_info_result_s
content.title: Device Result

content.query:
let row = dynamic({Row});
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| where '{Row}' == '{}' or (devices_name_s == row.devices_name_s)
| project devices_name_s, cluster_result_s, devices_boot_info_boot_info_result_s, devices_device_result_s, devices_device_login_s, devices_system_info_system_info_result_s, devices_health_info_health_info_result_s, devices_network_info_network_info_result_s, devices_drive_info_drive_info_result_s
| summarize arg_max(cluster_result_s, devices_boot_info_boot_info_result_s, devices_device_result_s, devices_device_login_s, devices_system_info_system_info_result_s, devices_health_info_health_info_result_s, devices_network_info_network_info_result_s, devices_drive_info_drive_info_result_s) by tostring(devices_name_s)
| extend ClusterResult = cluster_result_s, DeviceBootResult = devices_boot_info_boot_info_result_s, DeviceResult = devices_device_result_s, DeviceLogin = devices_device_login_s, SystemResult = devices_system_info_system_info_result_s, HealthResult = devices_health_info_health_info_result_s, NetworkResult = devices_network_info_network_info_result_s, DriveResult = devices_drive_info_drive_info_result_s
content.title: Device Result

content.query:
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| extend systemInfo=parse_json(devices_system_info_result_detail_s)
| project TimeGenerated, devices_name_s, systemInfo
| mv-expand systemInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (systemInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (systemInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (systemInfo.['fetched']), Result = (systemInfo.['comparison_result'])
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,DeviceName, Expected, Fetched,Result) by tostring(FieldName)
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName)
| extend Cpu = iff(FieldName == "cpu_sockets", Fetched, ""), Mem = iff(FieldName == "memory_capacity_GB", Fetched, ""), Mod = iff(FieldName == "Model", Fetched, ""), CpuResult = iff(FieldName == "cpu_sockets", Result, ""), MemR = iff(FieldName == "memory_capacity_GB", Result, ""), ModR = iff(FieldName == "Model", Result, "")
| serialize
| extend Model1 = iff(next(Mod)!='',next(Mod),''), Model1R = iff(next(ModR)!='',next(ModR),''), Memory = iff(next(Mem)!='',next(Mem),''), MemoryResult = iff(next(MemR)!='',next(MemR),'')
| extend Model = iff(next(Model1)!='',next(Model1),''),  ModelResult = iff(next(Model1R)!='',next(Model1R),'')
| where Cpu!= '' and CpuResult != ''
| project Cpu, CpuResult, Memory, MemoryResult, Model, ModelResult
content.title: Last reported system results

content.query:
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| extend systemInfo=parse_json(devices_system_info_result_detail_s)
| project TimeGenerated, devices_name_s, systemInfo
| mv-expand systemInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (systemInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (systemInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (systemInfo.['fetched']), Result = (systemInfo.['comparison_result'])
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName)
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName)
| extend Cpu = iff(FieldName == "cpu_sockets", Fetched, ""), Mem = iff(FieldName == "memory_capacity_GB", Fetched, ""), Mod = iff(FieldName == "Model", Fetched, ""), CpuResult = iff(FieldName == "cpu_sockets", Result, ""), MemR = iff(FieldName == "memory_capacity_GB", Result, ""), ModR = iff(FieldName == "Model", Result, "")
| serialize
| extend Model1 = iff(next(Mod)!='',next(Mod),''), Model1R = iff(next(ModR)!='',next(ModR),''), Memory = iff(next(Mem)!='',next(Mem),''), MemoryResult = iff(next(MemR)!='',next(MemR),'')
| extend Model = iff(next(Model1)!='',next(Model1),''),  ModelResult = iff(next(Model1R)!='',next(Model1R),'')
| where Cpu!= '' and CpuResult != ''
| extend CpuPass=iff(CpuResult == 'Pass', 1, 0), MemoryPass=iff(MemoryResult == 'Pass', 1, 0), ModelPass=iff(ModelResult == 'Pass', 1, 0), CpuFail=iff(CpuResult == 'Fail', 1, 0), MemoryFail=iff(MemoryResult == 'Fail', 1, 0), ModelFail=iff(ModelResult == 'Fail', 1, 0)
| summarize CpuPass = todecimal(sum(CpuPass)), MemoryPass = todecimal(sum(MemoryPass)), ModelPass = todecimal(sum(ModelPass)), CpuFail = todecimal(sum(CpuFail)), MemoryFail = todecimal(sum(MemoryFail)), ModelFail = todecimal(sum(ModelFail)) by DeviceName
| extend CpuPass_Percentage = todecimal(CpuPass/(CpuPass + CpuFail))*100, MemoryPass_Percentage = todecimal(MemoryPass/(MemoryPass + MemoryFail))*100, ModelPass_Percentage = todecimal(ModelPass/(ModelPass + ModelFail))*100
| project-reorder CpuPass, CpuFail, CpuPass_Percentage, MemoryPass, MemoryFail, MemoryPass_Percentage, ModelPass, ModelFail, ModelPass_Percentage
content.title: System Details

content.query:
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| extend systemInfo=parse_json(devices_system_info_result_detail_s)
| project TimeGenerated, devices_name_s, systemInfo
| mv-expand systemInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (systemInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (systemInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (systemInfo.['fetched']), Result = (systemInfo.['comparison_result'])
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName)
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName)
| extend Cpu = iff(FieldName == "cpu_sockets", Fetched, ""), Mem = iff(FieldName == "memory_capacity_GB", Fetched, ""), Mod = iff(FieldName == "Model", Fetched, ""), CpuResult = iff(FieldName == "cpu_sockets", Result, ""), MemR = iff(FieldName == "memory_capacity_GB", Result, ""), ModR = iff(FieldName == "Model", Result, "")
| serialize
| extend Model1 = iff(next(Mod)!='',next(Mod),''), Model1R = iff(next(ModR)!='',next(ModR),''), Memory = iff(next(Mem)!='',next(Mem),''), MemoryResult = iff(next(MemR)!='',next(MemR),'')
| extend Model = iff(next(Model1)!='',next(Model1),''),  ModelResult = iff(next(Model1R)!='',next(Model1R),'')
| where Cpu!= '' and CpuResult != ''
content.title: System Details

content.query:
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| where test_trigger_s == '{TriggerAction}'
| extend NetworkInfo=parse_json(devices_network_info_result_detail_s)
| project TimeGenerated, devices_name_s, NetworkInfo
| mv-expand NetworkInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (NetworkInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (NetworkInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (NetworkInfo.['fetched']), Result = (NetworkInfo.['comparison_result'])
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,DeviceName, Expected, Fetched,Result) by tostring(FieldName)
| extend s = split(FieldName,"_")
| extend Port = s[0], Type = s[1]
| extend Port = tostring(Port)
| extend LinkS = iff(Type == "LinkStatus", Fetched, ""), Model = iff(Type == "Model", Fetched, ""), LinkResult = iff(Type == "LinkStatus", Result, ""), ModelResult = iff(Type == "Model", Result, "")
| serialize
| extend LinkStatus = iff(isempty(LinkS),prev(LinkS),""), LinkResult = iff(isempty(LinkS),prev(LinkResult),"")
| project-away DeviceName, s, FieldName, LinkS, Type, Expected, Fetched, Result
| where Model!= ""
| project-reorder Port, LinkStatus, LinkResult, Model, ModelResult
content.title: Last reported Network results

content.query:
let row = dynamic({Row});
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| where test_trigger_s == '{TriggerAction}'
| extend NetworkInfo=parse_json(devices_network_info_result_detail_s)
| project TimeGenerated, devices_name_s, NetworkInfo
| mv-expand NetworkInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (NetworkInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (NetworkInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (NetworkInfo.['fetched']), Result = (NetworkInfo.['comparison_result'])
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName)
| extend s = split(FieldName,"_")
| extend Port = s[0], Type = s[1]
| extend Port = tostring(Port)
| where '{Row}' == '{}' or (Port == row.Port)
| extend LinkS = iff(Type == "LinkStatus", Fetched, ""), Model = iff(Type == "Model", Fetched, ""), LinkResult = iff(Type == "LinkStatus", Result, ""), ModelResult = iff(Type == "Model", Result, "")
| serialize
| extend LinkStatus = iff(isempty(LinkS),prev(LinkS),""), LinkResult = iff(isempty(LinkS),prev(LinkResult),"")
| project-away DeviceName, s, FieldName, LinkS, Type, Expected, Fetched, Result
| where Model!= ""
| extend LinkPass=iff(LinkResult == 'Pass', 1, 0), ModelPass=iff(ModelResult == 'Pass', 1, 0), LinkFail=iff(LinkResult == 'Fail', 1, 0), ModelFail=iff(ModelResult == 'Fail', 1, 0)
| summarize LinkPass = todecimal(sum(LinkPass)), ModelPass = todecimal(sum(ModelPass)), LinkFail = todecimal(sum(LinkFail)), ModelFail = todecimal(sum(ModelFail)) by Port
| extend LinkPass_Percentage = todecimal(LinkPass/(LinkPass + LinkFail))*100,  ModelPass_Percentage = todecimal(ModelPass/(ModelPass + ModelFail))*100
| project-reorder Port, LinkPass, LinkPass_Percentage, ModelPass, ModelPass_Percentage
content.title: Network results over timeframe selected

| extend Port = s[0], Type = s[1]
| extend Port = tostring(Port)

content.title: Total number of PASS per NIC

content.query:
let row = dynamic({Row});
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| where test_trigger_s == '{TriggerAction}'
| extend NetworkInfo=parse_json(devices_network_info_result_detail_s)
| project TimeGenerated, devices_name_s, NetworkInfo
| mv-expand NetworkInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (NetworkInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (NetworkInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (NetworkInfo.['fetched']), Result = (NetworkInfo.['comparison_result'])
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName)
| extend s = split(FieldName,"_")
| extend Port = s[0], Type = s[1]
| extend Port = tostring(Port)
| extend LinkS = iff(Type == "LinkStatus", Fetched, ""), Model = iff(Type == "Model", Fetched, ""), LinkResult = iff(Type == "LinkStatus", Result, ""), ModelResult = iff(Type == "Model", Result, "")
| serialize
| extend LinkStatus = iff(isempty(LinkS),prev(LinkS),""), LinkResult = iff(isempty(LinkS),prev(LinkResult),"")
| project-away DeviceName, s, FieldName, LinkS, Type, Expected, Fetched, Result
| where Model!= ""
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, Port, LinkStatus, LinkResult, Model, ModelResult
| where '{Row}' == '{}' or (Port == row.Port)
| extend Result_binary = iff(ModelResult == 'Pass' and LinkResult == 'Pass', 1, 0)
| summarize count(Result_binary) by TimeGenerated, Port
content.title: Metric result over time

content.query:
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| where test_trigger_s == '{TriggerAction}'
| extend DriveInfo=parse_json(devices_drive_info_result_detail_s)
| project TimeGenerated, devices_name_s, DriveInfo
| mv-expand DriveInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (DriveInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (DriveInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (DriveInfo.['fetched']), Result = (DriveInfo.['comparison_result'])
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,DeviceName, Expected, Fetched,Result) by tostring(FieldName)
| extend s = split(FieldName,"_")
| extend Disk = strcat(s[0],'_',s[1]), Type = iff(s[3]=='',s[2],strcat(s[2],'_',s[3]))
| extend Disk = tostring(Disk)
| extend DriveType = iff(Type == "Type", Fetched, ""), CapacityVal = iff(Type == "Capacity_GB", Fetched, ""), TypeResult = iff(Type == "Type", Result, ""),CapacityResult = iff(Type == "Capacity_GB", Result, "")
| serialize
| extend Capacity = iff(isempty(CapacityVal),prev(CapacityVal),""), CapacityResult = iff(isempty(CapacityVal),prev(CapacityResult),"")
| where DriveType!= ""
| project-away DeviceName, s, FieldName, Type, Expected, Fetched, Result, CapacityVal
| project-reorder Disk, DriveType, TypeResult, Capacity, CapacityResult
content.title: Last reported Disk results

content.query:
let row = dynamic({Row});
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| where test_trigger_s == '{TriggerAction}'
| extend DriveInfo=parse_json(devices_drive_info_result_detail_s)
| project TimeGenerated, devices_name_s, DriveInfo
| mv-expand DriveInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (DriveInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (DriveInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (DriveInfo.['fetched']), Result = (DriveInfo.['comparison_result'])
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName)
| extend s = split(FieldName,"_")
| extend Disk = strcat(s[0],'_',s[1]), Type = iff(s[3]=='',s[2],strcat(s[2],'_',s[3]))
| extend Disk = tostring(Disk)
| where '{Row}' == '{}' or (Disk == row.Disk)
| extend DriveType = iff(Type == "Type", Fetched, ""), CapacityVal = iff(Type == "Capacity_GB", Fetched, ""), TypeResult = iff(Type == "Type", Result, ""),CapacityResult = iff(Type == "Capacity_GB", Result, "")
| serialize
| extend Capacity = iff(isempty(CapacityVal),prev(CapacityVal),""), CapacityResult = iff(isempty(CapacityVal),prev(CapacityResult),"")
| where DriveType!= ""
| extend TypePass=iff(TypeResult == 'Pass', 1, 0), CapacityPass=iff(CapacityResult == 'Pass', 1, 0), TypeFail=iff(TypeResult == 'Fail', 1, 0), CapacityFail=iff(CapacityResult == 'Fail', 1, 0)
| summarize TypePass = todecimal(sum(TypePass)), CapacityPass = todecimal(sum(CapacityPass)), TypeFail = todecimal(sum(TypeFail)), CapacityFail = todecimal(sum(CapacityFail)) by Disk
| extend TypePass_Percentage = todecimal(TypePass/(TypePass + TypeFail))*100, CapacityPass_Percentage = todecimal(CapacityPass/(CapacityPass + CapacityFail))*100
| project-reorder Disk, TypePass, TypePass_Percentage, CapacityPass, CapacityPass_Percentage

let row = dynamic({Row});

content.query:
let row = dynamic({Row});
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| where test_trigger_s == '{TriggerAction}'
| extend DriveInfo=parse_json(devices_drive_info_result_detail_s)
| project TimeGenerated, devices_name_s, DriveInfo
| mv-expand DriveInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (DriveInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (DriveInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (DriveInfo.['fetched']), Result = (DriveInfo.['comparison_result'])
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName)
| extend s = split(FieldName,"_")
| extend Disk = strcat(s[0],'_',s[1]), Type = iff(s[3]=='',s[2],strcat(s[2],'_',s[3]))
| extend Disk = tostring(Disk)
| where '{Row}' == '{}' or (Disk == row.Disk)
| extend DriveType = iff(Type == "Type", Fetched, ""), CapacityVal = iff(Type == "Capacity_GB", Fetched, ""), TypeResult = iff(Type == "Type", Result, ""),CapacityResult = iff(Type == "Capacity_GB", Result, "")
| serialize
| extend Capacity = iff(isempty(CapacityVal),prev(CapacityVal),""), CapacityResult = iff(isempty(CapacityVal),prev(CapacityResult),"")
| where DriveType!= ""
| extend Result_binary = iff(CapacityResult == 'Pass' and TypeResult == 'Pass', 1, 0)
| summarize count(Result_binary) by TimeGenerated, Disk
content.title: Metric result over time

content.json: ###  _Select a Health Category to see more about the metrics under CPU/System Board/SSD/Misc._

parameters.name: HealthCategory
parameters.query:
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| extend HealthInfo=parse_json(devices_health_info_result_detail_s)
| project TimeGenerated, devices_name_s, HealthInfo
| mv-expand HealthInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (HealthInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (HealthInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (HealthInfo.['fetched']), Result = (HealthInfo.['comparison_result'])
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,DeviceName, Expected, Fetched,Result) by tostring(FieldName)
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName)
| extend Category = iff(FieldName contains "CPU", "CPU", iff(FieldName contains "System Board", "System Board", iff(FieldName contains "SSD", "SSD", iff(FieldName contains "Solid State Disk", "SSD", "Misc"))))
| distinct Category
| sort by Category asc

content.query:
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| where test_trigger_s == '{TriggerAction}'
| extend HealthInfo=parse_json(devices_health_info_result_detail_s)
| project TimeGenerated, devices_name_s, HealthInfo
| mv-expand HealthInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (HealthInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (HealthInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (HealthInfo.['fetched']), Result = (HealthInfo.['comparison_result'])
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,DeviceName, Expected, Fetched,Result) by tostring(FieldName)
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName), Result=tostring(Result)
| extend Category = iff(FieldName contains "CPU", "CPU", iff(FieldName contains "System Board", "System Board", iff(FieldName contains "SSD", "SSD", "Misc")))
| where Category == 'CPU'

| project-reorder Category, FieldName, Expected, Fetched, Result

content.query:
let row = dynamic({CPURow});
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| where test_trigger_s == '{TriggerAction}'
| extend HealthInfo=parse_json(devices_health_info_result_detail_s)
| project TimeGenerated, devices_name_s, HealthInfo
| mv-expand HealthInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (HealthInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (HealthInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (HealthInfo.['fetched']), Result = (HealthInfo.['comparison_result'])
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,DeviceName, Expected, Fetched,Result) by tostring(FieldName)
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName)
| where '{CPURow}' == '{}' or (FieldName == row.FieldName)

| mv-expand HealthInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (HealthInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (HealthInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (HealthInfo.['fetched']), Result = (HealthInfo.['comparison_result'])
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,DeviceName, Expected, Fetched,Result) by tostring(FieldName)
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName)
| where '{SSDRow}' == '{}' or (FieldName == row.FieldName)
| extend Category = iff(FieldName contains "CPU", "CPU", iff(FieldName contains "System Board", "System Board", iff(FieldName contains "SSD", "SSD", iff(FieldName contains "Solid State", "SSD", "Misc"))))

content.json: ###  _Click on a metric name above to see expeted vs actual result over entire timerange selected in below charts._

content.query:
let row = dynamic({SSDRow});
m16Demo_CL
| where cluster_s == '{Zone}'
| where devices_name_s == '{Computer}'
| where test_trigger_s == '{TriggerAction}'
| extend HealthInfo=parse_json(devices_health_info_result_detail_s)
| project TimeGenerated, devices_name_s, HealthInfo
| mv-expand HealthInfo
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName = devices_name_s, FieldName = (HealthInfo.['field_name']), Expected = (HealthInfo.['expected']), Fetched = (HealthInfo.['fetched']), Result = (HealthInfo.['comparison_result'])
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,DeviceName, Expected, Fetched,Result) by tostring(FieldName)
| extend  FieldName = tostring(FieldName)
| where '{SSDRow}' == '{}' or (FieldName == row.FieldName)
| extend Category = iff(FieldName contains "CPU", "CPU", iff(FieldName contains "System Board", "System Board", iff(FieldName contains "SSD", "SSD", iff(FieldName contains "Solid State Disk", "SSD", "Misc"))))
| where Category == "SSD"
| extend SB = todynamic(iff(FieldName contains "Solid State",split(FieldName,"Solid State "), iff(FieldName contains "SSD", split(FieldName,"PCIe SSD in "), "")))
| extend SSDInfo = SB[1]
| project-reorder Category, SSDInfo, TimeGenerated, Expected, Fetched, Result
content.title: SSD Health over time
